name: Agent Hammer
description:
Agent Hammer is a cool third person shooting game with tons of weapons and slowmo (Hammer) time to aim in hectic times properly.

Destroy everything in your way. Even buildings!

Collect money and spend it on new weapons and gadgets!

Use vehicles like Cars, Trucks, Vans, Tank, Gum Turrets and Helicopter.

Complete the missions and achievements!

There can be only one agent. Agent Hammer!

Can you destroy all objects at all 30 levels which this awesome game offers?

Have fun! We had it!

Controls:

Mouse: look around / aim
Arrow / WASD keys: move
Left mouse button: Primary weapon
Right mouse button: Secondary weapon
E = Interaction / Enter or leave vehicle
SHIFT = slow motion
SPACE = jump
V = view back
ESC = pause
